thread.title: Natalie Steyger

author: Natalie Steyger
title: Natalie Steyger
text: This was the first time that we used a housesitting service so it was a little nerve wracking at first thinking about complete strangers coming to stay in our house. To appease my mind, I first called trustedhousesitters.com and got excellent advice and input from the support person. This was definitely the most professional looking housesitting site that I had found and I gladly paid my membership fee after browsing the site extensively and talking to the support person. After putting up my "ad" the feedback was incredible and we actually found a brilliant couple who came all the way from the States to look after our house and cat in Munich. So thank you, trustedhousesitters.com, for connecting us with the right people!
